name: Wallo
overview:
Wallo is the personal finance service that helps people easily track and manage their money for free.

Users sign up to Wallo anonymously providing just an email address. In just ten minutes, users can set up their account, understand their finances like never before and start getting money saving recommendations.

Users get access to all their financial accounts in one place with their transactions automatically classified so they can instantly understand where their money goes. With Wallo, users can plan their future cashflows and bill payments so that they never get caught with overdraft charges again.

Wallo automatically calculates a recommended budget for users and helps them track their spending to achieve their savings goals. Wallo also provides timely, customized recommendations to get the smartest deals from key service providers.
